actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigations of certain potential water resource developments.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigations of potential water resource developments related to the Frenchman-Cambridge Division, Pick Sloan Missouri Basin program, in specified counties in Nebraska.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigations of certain potential water resource developments.
